core_exploration.central_question: What is the minimum viable outcome that would justify this partnership investment?
core_exploration.key_tension: The tension between partnership complexity and simple, measurable success criteria
core_exploration.breakthrough_moment: Recognizing that all partnership value can be distilled to one clear, specific outcome
core_exploration.edge_of_understanding: How to actually achieve this outcome or whether the partnership is the right vehicle

conceptual_dna: True partnership value emerges when you can define success in one concrete, measurable outcome
Drawing lines in the sand forces clarity about what really matters versus what seems important
The worthwhile test: if you could only accomplish one thing, what would justify everything else?

bridge_potential.novel_synthesis: Applying minimalist clarity principles to partnership evaluation
bridge_potential.cross_domain_pattern: Single outcome clarity as a decision-making filter across complex commitments

raw_essence: Partnership decisions become clear when you identify the single outcome that would make everything worthwhile. This person realized their partnership's entire value hinges on achieving $20k monthly income working remotely less than 20 hours per week.
embedding_text: partnership evaluation single outcome clarity decision making worthwhile test minimum viable success remote work income goals business strategy
